mapper.select: SELECT sa.account_number as accountNumber, sa.opener_id as openerId, sa.current_balance as balance, sa.saving_name as savingName, sa.progress_rate as progressRate, psd.image as categoryImg FROM saving_account sa join pet_saving_product psd on psd.category = sa.category join join_saving js on js.account_number = sa.account_number WHERE js.guest_id = #{guest_id} AND pet_id = #{pet_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saving_account(account_number, join_period, end_date, category, opener_id, saving_name, pet_id, final_amount, interest_amount) VALUES (#{account_number}, #{join_period}, TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{category}, #{guest_id}, #{saving_name}, #{pet_id}, #{final_amount}, #{interest_amount})
mapper.select: select js.guest_id as guestId, sa.account_number as accountNumber, sa.opening_date as openingDate, sa.end_date as endDate, psd.category as category, psd.image as categoryImg, sa.opener_id as openerId, sa.current_balance as balance, sa.saving_name as savingName, pet.name as petName, sa.progress_rate as progressRate, sa.final_amount as finalAmount, sa.interest_amount as interestAmount, js.join_date as joinDate, js.contribution_amount as contributionAmount, js.contribution_ratio as contributionRatio, js.transfer_amount as transferAmount, js.transfer_period as transferPeriod from saving_account sa join join_saving js on sa.account_number = js.account_number join pet_saving_product psd on psd.category = sa.category join pet on pet.pet_id = sa.pet_id where sa.account_number = #{accountNumber}

select distinct th.auto_transfer_id as id, da.guest_id as guestId, th.account_number_in as accountNumberIn, th.account_number_out as accountNumberOut, th.transfer_date as transferDate, th.amount as amount, th.balance_after_in as balanceAfterIn from transfer_history th join deposit_account da on da.account_number = th.account_number_out where th.account_number_in = #{accountNumber} order by id desc
